channel.title: CVE Feed for Pivotal -- Gemfire for PCF
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pivotal -- Gemfire for PCF

item.title: CVE-2016-8220|2024-09-16T22:20:31.669Z -- pivotal -- gemfire%20for%20pcf
item.description: Pivotal Gemfire for PCF, versions 1.6.x prior to 1.6.5.0 and 1.7.x prior to 1.7.1.0, contain an information disclosure vulnerability. The application inadvertently exposed WAN replication credentials at a public route.
